name: Intro
text: I’ve stepped on to the island for the first time in my life; I’m ecstatic! I still can’t believe the funding for this venture got approved!

It didn’t take me long to find where the 5 Trials is. There’s a cave that leads deep into the island. I’m surprised it's barely hidden. It’s as if it was designed to lure people inside. Even just looking at it, I get an urge to peek…
